doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Mahbubur Rahman
doctor.specialty: ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) Specialist & Head Neck Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Mahbubur Rahman is a ENT Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, DLO, FRCS (Glasgow, UK). He is a Professor & Head (Ex), ENT & Head Neck Surgery at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Barishal ENT Care Centre. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Mahbubur Rahman at Barishal ENT Care Centre is 11am to 2pm (Closed: Friday).
